description: Detects suspicious use of PCHunter, a tool like Process Hacker to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level stuff
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: PCHunter Usage
query: ((process.executable.text:(*\\PCHunter64.exe OR *\\PCHunter32.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"PCHunter.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Epoolsoft Windows Information View Tools") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*SHA1\=5F1CBC3D99558307BC1250D084FA968521482025* OR *MD5\=987B65CD9B9F4E9A1AFD8F8B48CF64A7* OR *SHA256\=2B214BDDAAB130C274DE6204AF6DBA5AEEC7433DA99AA950022FA306421A6D32* OR *IMPHASH\=444D210CEA1FF8112F256A4997EED7FF* OR *SHA1\=3FB89787CB97D902780DA080545584D97FB1C2EB* OR *MD5\=228DD0C2E6287547E26FFBD973A40F14* OR *SHA256\=55F041BF4E78E9BFA6D4EE68BE40E496CE3A1353E1CA4306598589E19802522C* OR *IMPHASH\=0479F44DF47CFA2EF1CCC4416A538663*)) OR (md5:("228dd0c2e6287547e26ffbd973a40f14" OR "987b65cd9b9f4e9a1afd8f8b48cf64a7")) OR (sha1:("5f1cbc3d99558307bc1250d084fa968521482025" OR "3fb89787cb97d902780da080545584d97fb1c2eb")) OR (sha256:("2b214bddaab130c274de6204af6dba5aeec7433da99aa950022fa306421a6d32" OR "55f041bf4e78e9bfa6d4ee68be40e496ce3a1353e1ca4306598589e19802522c")) OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:("444d210cea1ff8112f256a4997eed7ff" OR "0479f44df47cfa2ef1ccc4416a538663")))
